channel.title: Authors on Liminal Markets
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Liminal Markets

item.title: Dr. Stephen Rush, CFA
item.description: Stephen is a Chartered Financial Analyst and holds a PhD from the University of Connecticut as well as an MSF and MBA from Boston College. Prior to his career in finance, Stephen served for 10 years in the United States Marine Corps in roles ranging from pianist to intelligence analyst.
